item.title: WhatsApp for iOS introduces AR Effects, Backgrounds and Document Scanning - India TV News
item.description:
WhatsApp for iOS introduces AR Effects, Backgrounds and Document Scanning

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: India TV News

WhatsApp’s latest update for iOS introduces augmented reality (AR) effects to its camera feature, providing users with new creative options for capturing media.

  • Introduction of AR effects like confetti, underwater, and sparkles in the camera.
  • Customizable backgrounds to obscure surroundings in photos and videos.
  • Video color tone adjustment for a polished output.
  • New document scanning feature allows users to scan and share documents within WhatsApp.
  • Supports filters such as color, grayscale, and black-and-white.
  • Automatic cropping and border resizing for easier document processing.
  • New festive-themed features enhance messaging experiences.
  • Available in WhatsApp for iOS version 24.25.93.
“Users can enjoy a more versatile and engaging experience with the app.”

In conclusion, these updates significantly enhance the user experience on WhatsApp, especially with the integration of AR and document scanning features that cater to various user needs.

item.title: OnePlus Ace 5 Pro With Snapdragon 8 Elite Extreme Edition SoC Launched Alongside OnePlus Ace 5: Details - Gadgets 360
item.description:
OnePlus Ace 5 Series Debuts With Snapdragon Chipsets: Price, Features

Publication Date: Thursday, Source: Gadgets360

The OnePlus Ace 5 Pro and OnePlus Ace 5 were launched in China on Thursday, featuring advanced Snapdragon chipsets and impressive specifications.

  • OnePlus Ace 5 Pro powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite Extreme Edition SoC.
  • OnePlus Ace 5 powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset.
  • Available with up to 16GB RAM and 1TB storage.
  • Features a 6.78-inch display with 1.5K resolution.
  • Both models have a triple rear camera with a 50-megapixel primary sensor.
  • Wide range of price options starting from CNY 2,299 to CNY 4,699.
“The OnePlus Ace 5 Pro offers exceptional performance with 100W SuperVOOC fast charging, reaching 100% in just 35 minutes.”

The launch of the OnePlus Ace 5 series showcases the brand's continual push for cutting-edge technology and competitive pricing in the mobile market.

item.title: Microsoft Releases AIOpsLab, an Open-Source Standardised AI Framework for AIOps Agents - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Microsoft Releases AIOpsLab for Cloud-Based Agents

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: Gadgets 360

Microsoft researchers released an open-source artificial intelligence (AI) framework for agents that operate in cloud environments called AIOpsLab. This new framework aims to assist developers in building, testing, and improving AIOps agents, supported by Azure AI Agent Service.

  • The AIOpsLab framework separates the agent and application service, allowing for better integration and flexibility.
  • It includes a workload and fault generator for training AI agents.
  • AIOpsLab supports key tasks such as incident detection, localisation, root cause diagnosis, and mitigation.
  • The framework is available on GitHub under the MIT licence.
  • A research paper on AIOpsLab was accepted at the ACM Symposium on Cloud Computing 2024.
"AIOps agents address significant operational challenges in fault diagnosis and mitigation for cloud services."

The release of AIOpsLab showcases Microsoft's commitment to enhancing cloud operational efficiencies through open-source solutions.

item.title: iPhone 15 price drops but offer will expire soon - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 15 Price Drops But Offer Will Expire Soon

Publication Date: Just Now | Source: India Today

The iPhone 15 is available at a significant discount through Flipkart as part of their Big Saving Days sale, which ends tonight. The price drop on the 128GB model is highlighted.

  • The 128GB iPhone 15 model is now priced at Rs 58,999, down from Rs 69,999, a discount of Rs 11,000.
  • This offer applies primarily to the green color variant; other colors are listed at Rs 59,999.
  • Customers can consider exchange offers to lower the price further.
  • The device features a 6.1-inch display and comes in five colors: pink, yellow, green, blue, and black.
  • The phone is powered by the A16 Bionic chip and includes a 48-megapixel primary camera.
  • The battery is designed for all-day use but offers around 9 hours of average battery life.
  • The iPhone 15 now uses a USB Type-C charging port instead of the Lightning connector.
"The iPhone 15 captures stunning photos in various lighting conditions."

With its enhanced features and significant discount, the iPhone 15 represents a valuable offer, especially for those looking to upgrade.

item.title: WhatsApp releases new update for iOS users, now apply AR effects and more to camera - India Today
item.description:
WhatsApp releases new update for iOS users, now apply AR effects and more to camera

Published On: Dec 26, 2024  |  Published By: Aman rashid

The latest WhatsApp update for iOS introduces exciting features, including augmented reality effects, new video backgrounds, and a document scanning option, enhancing the app's usability for users who frequently share content.

  • New AR effects now available in the WhatsApp camera.
  • Ability to add various backgrounds to video recordings for improved privacy.
  • Integrated document scanning option within the sharing menu, allowing users to digitize documents easily.
  • Recent features include new animations and stickers for festive messaging.
“These new tools come shortly after WhatsApp rolled out a series of festive updates to enhance video calls and messages ahead of the New Year celebrations.”

This update marks a significant step in improving the user experience for WhatsApp's iOS platform, making it more engaging and practical for daily use.

item.title: Nothing Phone 3a models to get Qualcomm chips, telephoto camera: Report - Business Standard
item.description:
Nothing Phone 3a models to get Qualcomm chips, telephoto camera: Report

Last Updated: Dec 26 2024, 4:09 PM IST | Source: Business Standard

The upcoming Nothing Phone 3a and Phone 3a Plus are set to utilize Qualcomm's Snapdragon 7s Gen three chip, showcasing significant upgrades including dedicated hardware for optical-quality zoom.

  • Both models expected to launch in 2025 alongside the flagship Nothing Phone 3.
  • Qualcomm chips will replace MediaTek processors from previous models.
  • Nothing Phone 3a to feature a telephoto camera, while the Plus model may include a periscopic zoom camera.
  • Support for eSIM feature is anticipated for select models.
  • CMF Phone 2 expected to maintain physical SIM support only.
"The Nothing Phone 3a series models could be the company's first smartphones to feature telephoto cameras."

This evolution in Nothing’s offerings could redefine their smartphone capabilities, particularly in camera technology.

item.title: DEEBOT Y1 PRO: The Fuss-Free Cleaning Companion - The Hindu
item.description:
DEEBOT Y1 PRO: The Fuss-Free Cleaning Companion

Published: December 26, 2024 03:24 pm IST

Source: ECOVACS

The DEEBOT Y1 PRO makes daily home cleaning effortless with its compact design, tailored for simplicity and convenience. It combines affordability with powerful performance, making it an excellent entry point for robotic cleaning enthusiasts.

  • Combines vacuuming and mopping in one device.
  • 6500Pa suction power for thorough cleaning.
  • Long-lasting 5200mAh battery provides up to 180 minutes of runtime.
  • Features automatic carpet recognition for smart cleaning.
  • Compact design allows cleaning under furniture.
  • Integration with Alexa and Google Assistant for hands-free control.
“The DEEBOT Y1 PRO embodies what it means to have a truly fuss-free cleaning experience.”

This robotic vacuum and mop prioritizes convenience and reliability, making daily cleaning simpler for urban dwellers and families.

item.title: Xiaomi Pad 7 set to launch on January 10: What to expect? - India TV News
item.description:
Xiaomi Pad 7 Set to Launch on January 10: What to Expect?

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: India TV News

Xiaomi is preparing to launch the Xiaomi Pad 7 in India on January 10, 2025, featuring versatile capabilities bolstered by additional accessories like a keyboard and stylus.

Key Points:

  • 11.2-inch 3K LCD screen with 144Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 SoC.
  • Premium unibody metal design.
  • Runs on Xiaomi's latest HyperOS.
  • Includes a floating keyboard and a mechanical press touchpad.
  • 8850 mAh battery with 45W fast charging.

India-specific Launch Details:

Xiaomi will not launch the Pad 7 Pro variant in India.

Availability:

  • Available on Amazon.in
  • mi.com
  • Offline stores across India.

Conclusion: The Xiaomi Pad 7 is anticipated to appeal to both casual and professional users with its powerful features and design.

item.title: Apple Joins Google In Antitrust Battle To Protect $20 Billion Search Deal: Key Things To Know - Times Now
item.description:
Apple Joins Google In Antitrust Battle To Protect $20 Billion Search Deal: Key Things To Know

Date: Not specified Source: Times Now

Apple has requested to join Google in the ongoing antitrust case with the U.S. government, seeking to safeguard their lucrative partnership that makes Google the default search engine on Apple devices.

  • The deal, reportedly worth $20 billion annually, is critical to Apple’s business.
  • Apple claims that the association with Google ensures access to the most popular search engine for consumers.
  • Apple's entry into the antitrust case comes as Google faces pressures that may lead to its breakup.
  • The penalty phase is set for April 2025 and could reshape Apple and Google's partnership.
  • Analysts warn that losing the revenue-sharing deal could significantly impact Apple's finances.
“Should the partnership fall apart, it would harm the consumers who prefer Google’s product.”

This legal battle will determine if one of Silicon Valley's most lucrative collaborations can survive.

item.title: How to use ‘Circle to Search’ on your Android mobile- Full guide - HT Tech
item.description:
How to Use 'Circle to Search' on Your Android Mobile - Full Guide

Publication Date: Not specified, Source: Hindustan Times

Google's Circle to Search feature enables fast and easy searching directly from an Android phone's screen, allowing users to identify objects, translate text, and gather information seamlessly.

What Is Circle to Search?

Circle to Search allows users to select text or images on their screen to perform an instant Google search without switching between apps.

How to Activate Circle to Search

To activate Circle to Search, follow these steps:

  • For 3-Button Navigation: Long press the Home button.
  • For Gesture Navigation: Long press the navigation bar at the bottom of the screen.

How to Use Circle to Search

  1. Activate the Feature: Long press the Home button or navigation bar.
  2. Highlight or Circle: Circle the text or image you want to search.
  3. Review Search Results: Swipe up to view the search results.
  4. Refine Your Search: Modify your query in the search bar if needed.

Common Uses of Circle to Search

  • Object Identification: Gather information about objects in images or videos.
  • Text Translation: Translate foreign text instantly.
  • Online Shopping: Compare prices and discover products.
  • Contextual Information: Get additional context on unfamiliar terms.
  • Media Discovery: Identify songs or movie scenes.

Why Circle to Search Is Valuable

This feature enhances multitasking capabilities by letting users search directly from their current screen.

How to Check Availability

Circle to Search is available on select Android devices, requiring the latest software version. Google Lens offers similar functionality as a separate tool.

item.title: Vivo Y29 5G: New smartphone with ‘military grade durability’, know features, price, specifications and more - DNA India
item.description:
Vivo Y29 5G: New smartphone with ‘military grade durability’, know features, price, specifications and more

Publication Date: Not specified Source: DNA India

Vivo has launched the Y29 5G, featuring enhanced durability and impressive specifications designed for today's tech enthusiasts. Priced at Rs 13,999, it's available on Amazon and Vivo's official site.

  • The Y29 is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor.
  • IP64 rated for dust and water resistance.
  • Features Dynamic Light around the camera module for notifications.
  • Available in three colors: Diamond black, Titanium gold, and Glacier blue.
  • 6.68-inch Dotch Display with 120 Hz refresh rate.
  • Robust 5500 mAh battery with 44W fast charging capability.
  • 50 MP rear camera with low-light photography enhancements.
  • Variant options: 4GB/128GB, 6GB/128GB, 8GB/128GB, and 8GB/256GB.
  • Prices for variants range from Rs 13,999 to Rs 18,999.
"The Y29's battery can maintain 80% health over 4 years, ensuring peak performance."

The Vivo Y29 5G merges affordability with advanced technology, making it a compelling choice in the smartphone market.

item.title: Flipkart Year End Sale: Get iPhone 15 at Rs 26,999 and More - Analytics Insight
item.description:
Flipkart Year End Sale: Get iPhone 15 at Rs 26,999 and More

Date: October 2023
Source: Flipkart

Flipkart Black Friday Sale has started with fantastic deals on smartphones, laptops, and other electronic gadgets, providing great opportunities for tech upgrades at discounted prices.

  • Apple iPhone 15 is available for Rs. 26,999 with exchange offers.
  • Available features include a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display and A16 Bionic chip.
  • The iPhone 15 offers a dual 48 MP camera and up to 20 hours of battery life.
  • 14-minute delivery service available in select locations for the iPhone 15.
  • Other deals include Samsung Galaxy S23 for ₹38,999, Nothing Phone (2), and Vivo V30 Pro.
“The Flipkart Big Saving Days Sale has great deals on all sorts of tech products, be it a new smartphone or a laptop. So, grab these offers now to delight a loved one with a New Year present.”

In conclusion, the Flipkart Year End Sale presents an excellent opportunity for consumers to purchase premium smartphones and gadgets at incredibly low prices, making it a prime time for tech shopping.

item.title: OnePlus 12R price drops ahead of OnePlus 13R launch in January: Check out the latest offers - HT Tech
item.description:
OnePlus 12R Price Drops Ahead of OnePlus 13R Launch in January

Publication Date: Recent

Source: Hindustan Times

The OnePlus 12R is seeing significant price cuts ahead of the release of the OnePlus 13R on January 7, 2025, making it an attractive option for buyers considering an upgrade.

  • The original price of the OnePlus 12R is Rs.42999, now available for Rs.38999 on Amazon (a 9% discount).
  • Additional offers include Rs.3000 off with ICICI Bank credit card and Rs.1500 off with HDFC Bank EMI.
  • Up to Rs.22800 off is available through exchange offers, depending on the old device's condition.
  • The OnePlus 12R features a 6.78-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, and a triple camera setup.
“The OnePlus 12R features a triple camera setup consisting of a 50 MP main camera, an 8MP ultrawide camera, and a 2MP macro lens.”

With these discounts and features, the OnePlus 12R could be a worthy smartphone option for those in the market for a new device.

item.title: iPhone 16 selling at the lowest price ever - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 16 Selling at the Lowest Price Ever

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: India Today

The iPhone 16 is currently being sold at a record-low price. Here's what you need to know about this limited-time offer.

  • The iPhone 16 is priced at Rs 77,400, down from the launch price of Rs 79,999, offering a discount of Rs 2,599.
  • Additional discounts of Rs 5,000 are available for payments made with ICICI, Kotak, or SBI Bank cards, bringing the price down to Rs 72,400.
  • An exchange offer is available for up to Rs 65,790, depending on the condition and age of the old phone being traded in.
  • The iPhone 16 features Apple Intelligence, the latest A18 chip, and a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display.
  • Camera capabilities include a 48MP main and a 12MP ultra-wide rear camera, along with a 12MP front camera.
  • It is also IP68-rated for durability against water and dust.
“Croma is running an exchange offer of up to Rs 65,790.”

This limited-time offer makes the iPhone 16 an attractive purchase, especially with the added discounts and features it offers.

item.title: iPhone 17 Air to redefine design with sleek build and big upgrades - India TV News
item.description:
iPhone 17 Air to Redefine Design with Sleek Build and Big Upgrades

Publication Date: December 25, 2024 Source: India TV News

Apple's upcoming iPhone 17 series, launching in September 2025, is generating significant buzz with innovations including a new design and ProMotion displays across all models. The standout iPhone 17 Air could set a new benchmark for slimmer designs.

  • The iPhone 17 Air is rumored to be Apple’s thinnest iPhone yet, potentially measuring just 6.25mm.
  • All models may feature ProMotion technology with a 120Hz refresh rate for better display performance.
  • New A19 Pro chip in Pro models promises faster performance and enhanced energy efficiency.
  • Camera upgrades include a 24MP front-facing camera and a possible triple 48MP setup in the Pro Max variant.
  • Unique centered camera bump design diverges from traditional placements.
“The iPhone 17 Air may introduce a unique centred camera bump, diverging from Apple’s traditional top-left placement.”

The iPhone 17 Air is set to bring major advancements in design and technology, further reinforcing Apple’s innovation in the smartphone industry.

item.description:
Meta to Launch New Ray-Ban Glasses with Display Next Year

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: 9To5Google via Financial Times

Meta is working on a new version of Ray-Ban smart glasses that will feature a display, set to launch possibly in the second half of 2025. These glasses aim to compete with Google's XR platform devices.

  • The upcoming Ray-Ban glasses may showcase an integrated display for notifications and responses.
  • Earlier in 2023, Meta unveiled its Orion Glasses, the most advanced AR glasses to date.
  • Google recently showcased its own extended reality platform in collaboration with Samsung, emphasizing AI integration.
“Meta could launch new Ray-Ban glasses 'as soon as next year' with an integrated display.”

As the technology landscape in AR and XR continues to evolve, the integration of AI and augmented reality will likely enhance user experiences significantly.
